name: America SCORES Soccer
description: "America SCORES Bay Area inspires youth to lead healthy lives, be engaged students, and have the confidence and character to make a difference in the world. America SCORES partners with Bay Area schools, districts and youth-serving organizations to deliver after school programs using a team-based approach to youth development programming that is comprehensive and holistic in nature. Our core components - soccer, poetry and service learning - build essential developmental assets in youth that pr
